channel.title: Welcome on Bauer Music Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Bauer Music Studio

item.title: About
item.description: About Me My name is Randy Bauer, I'm an Idaho native born and raised in Caldwell. At 11 years old I started learning to play the trumpet; I've now been playing the trumpet for 15 years. My experience as a young trumpet player was difficult because my embouchure and fundementals were poorly established. No matter how many hours I practiced, I played with pain in my embourchure and struggled to perform.

item.title: Method and Pricing
item.description: LESSONS Welcome to Bauer Music Studio, trumpet lessons! Investing in personal growth as a musician is an imporant step, taking trumpet lessons from me is having a personal trainer guide you through fundemental trumpet skills. In lessons we will focus on creating a personalized practice routine to help you reach your performance goals. Schedule a Free Trail Lesson Musicianship Fostering personal growth as a musician outside of an ensemble.
